name: Disguised: Ainun Story
description:
Yes ... a beautiful girl named Ainun ,. 22 years old, and she's a smart girl. because of mystical things he was trapped on campus, many obstacles and puzzles he had to face ,.
always pay attention to what's around, because maybe it's useful, and always remember there are ghosts who are always paying attention.
Help him to get out of campus, solve puzzles. and don't let the ghost catch you ...
